Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
folder
<operating system> A {directory} in the sense of a collection of computer {files}. The term is more common in systems such as the {Macintosh} or {Windows 95} which have a {graphical user interface} and provide a graphical {file browser} in which directories are traditionally depicted as folders (like small briefcases).
(1997-03-20)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Folder \Fold"er\, n. One who, or that which, folds; esp., a flat, knifelike instrument used for folding paper. [1913 Webster]
folder n 1: a small book usually having a paper cover [syn: {booklet}, {brochure}, {leaflet}, {pamphlet}] 2: covering that is folded over to protect the contents
